연차 데이터 없음: There is no annual leave registered.
연차 없음 안내: There is no annual leave used.
부서장 연차현황 공개 설명: If allowed, managers can see their member's annual leave information.
휴가사유제한: You can enter up to 255 characters for vacation reasons.
휴가일수는 0.5 단위로 입력해 주세요: Please input the number of vacation days by 0.5 unit
1년 미만 발생 월차: The number of days of Annual leave for who worked less than one year
1년 미만 이월 월차: The number of days of Annual leave carryover for who worked less than one year
해당 버튼을 클릭하면 연차 자동 생성이 시작되며,<br> 휴가 부여기준은:
When you click the Start button, and automatically generates an annual leave,
annual leave given criteria can not be modified. Do you want to proceed?
설정한 기준으로 연차를 시작하시겠습니까?: Do you want to start annual leave based on the set criteria?
샘플양식을 다운받아 양식에 맞게 작성 후 업로드해주시기 바랍니다.<br>:
Please download the sample form, fill it out and upload it.
When re-upload, it will be replaced with the latest update file.
1년 미만자 월차: The number of days of Monthly vacation for who worked less than one year
It applies based on the fiscal year or the date of entry
Annual leave can be registered in 0.25 units.
The annual leave and reconciliation annual leave, usage history is reset because information is changed.
일괄 조정 기능을 이용하여 연차를 조정하시기 바랍니다: Please use the batch adjustment function to adjust the annual leave
ID(계정) 은 그룹웨어 계정 이메일 주소에서 id 값: ID (account) is the id value in the groupware account email address
입사일은 yyyy-mm-dd 형식으로 입력 (ex 2018-01-01): Enter the date of entry in yyyy-mm-dd format (ex 2018-01-01)
입사일을 미 입력 시, 연차는 자동 생성되지 않음: If you do not enter an occupation date, annual leave is not automatically created
연차 현황을 위한 꿀팁 가이드 설명 1: 1. In the top [Annual initial setting], please set the user's date of entry, Used annual leave, Generated annual leave as csv file first.
연차 현황을 위한 꿀팁 가이드 설명 2: 2. In the Company's annual leave status → Vacation Grant criteria, click [Start annual leave] to automatically generate the annual leave income.
연차 현황을 위한 꿀팁 가이드 설명 3: 3. If you do not enter the date, the year will not be automatically generated.
연차 현황을 위한 꿀팁 가이드 설명 4: Please carry out the annual leave carryover and Additional annual leave through the [Annual leave batch adjustment] function.
연차 현황을 위한 꿀팁 가이드 설명 5: * For more information, please use help page.
연차초기설정 시 결재문서 안내사항: In-progress approval documents are not available after upload. Please upload it after it is approved.
Annual leave can be registered in 0.25 units.
연차 현황 꿀팁 가이드:
Tip for Annual leave management

  1. In the top [Annual initial setting] Please set the user's date of entry, Used annual leave, Generated annual leave as csv file first.
  2. In the Company's annual leave status → Vacation Grant criteria, click [Start annual leave] to automatically generate the annual leave income.
  3. If you do not enter the date, the year will not be automatically generated.
  4. Please carry out the annual leave carryover and Additional annual leave through the [Annual leave batch adjustment] function.

For more information, please use help page.
연차생성기준타이틀: Set criteria for annual leaves (First time only)
연차시작설명: You can not change the set criteria for annual leaves
연차시작후설명: Setup is complete. You can not change the set criteria for annual leaves
연차 데이터 메뉴연동: Sync annual leave data with other menu
연차유형관리 설명: Management type of annual leave are available when use the template [Approval > Apply Vacation - Interlocking annual leave management]
Vacation type can't contain special character _
연차와 사용일수는 1일, 0.5일, 0.25일 단위로 입력: Please annual leave and used days enter in 1, 0.5, 0.25 units
공휴일 포함 여부 툴팁: Whether to select a holiday for the type of annual leave, If not included, annual leave cannot be deducted on public holidays. If you have Saturday and Sunday workers, please select Include.
유/무급 툴팁: You can choose whether to pay or not pay for annual leave, If you choose unpaid, the annual leave does not include working hours. Working hours are not included for designated working hours and autonomous commuting users regardless of the paid and unpaid settings.
사용 가능일 수 툴팁: You can set the maximum number of days you can use for that year.
사용 가능일 수 에러메시지: The number of days used has exceeded {{availableMax}} days.
사용 가능일 수 가이드: Please enter the number of days available. (ex 0.5, 1, 2)
You must enter the number of days available.
연차연동 설명: You can check annual leave data in other menu
재직1년이상 월차 에러메시지: You cannot add a Monthly leave to a user whose employment date does not exist or to a user who has passed one year from the date of employment.
시작/종료 시간 에러메시지: The end time cannot be set earlier than the start time.
시작/종료 시간 항목간 에러메시지: The end/start time set for each item is incorrect.
시작/종료 시간 툴팁: When using start/end time, you can set the start time and end time of the holiday to be displayed in the attendance exposure function.
The annual leave and reconciliation annual leave, usage history is reset because information is changed.
단일 자동 생성 설명:
ON: Annual leave is automatically generated based on the annual leave you set (fiscal year/date of entry).
OFF: Annual leave is not automatically generated.
입사일 미입력: need information on the date of entry the company
다중 자동 생성 설명:
ON: Annual leave is automatically generated based on the annual leave you set (fiscal year/date of entry).
(Users who do not have a company date based on the company date will be excluded from the batch adjustment.)
OFF: No annual leave is automatically generated.
